Year 2017

Audi Leasing

What was the task?
My job was to implement Audi Leasing.
Setting up the project from scratch and implement every single element and block from a-z with some tweaks and addons, using my own markup and styling techniques with Bootstrap v. 3.7 as framework.

What did I use?
Jekyll, Bootstrap v. 3.7, HTML, SCSS, jQuery and Bitbucket.
